Key Match Events: Evin Lewis scored 102 not out off 61 balls to guide West Indies to victory
Sherfane Rutherford scored 50 not out off 26 balls
West Indies won by eight wickets via DLS Method
Evin Lewis scored his third ODI century against Sri Lanka, his first since March 2021
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka posted 156 for three in their 23 overs
Kusal Mendis and Pathum Nissanka shared a 57-run stand for the second wicket
Shai Hope scored 22 for West Indies
Brandon King scored 16 for West Indies
